meanings.definition: A wealthy and influential business person.
meanings.sent1: The local magnate owned many businesses in town.
meanings.sent2: The tech magnate revolutionized the industry with his innovative ideas.
meanings.sent3: The magnate's wealth was so vast, he could buy the entire town if he wanted to.
meanings.sent4: She was a magnate in the fashion world, her influence spreading far and wide.
meanings.sent5: The magnate's power and wealth towered over all others in the business world.

meanings.definition: A person of great influence or importance in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: As a political magnate, he swayed the opinions of many voters.
meanings.sent2: The literary magnate was revered for his contributions to the world of poetry.
meanings.sent3: The magnate of the art world was known for his eccentric taste in paintings.
meanings.sent4: She became a magnate in the music industry, shaping the careers of many artists.
meanings.sent5: The magnate of the culinary world had a restaurant empire that spanned the globe.
